sentences.sentence: Year of the Tiger and his 18 tigresses, " said Rob Clarke, 42, of the Lower East Side."
sentences.translation: 公老虎和它18只母老虎杰作的年份，”下东区42岁的罗布克拉克说到。

sentences.sentence: Some of the tigresses even cruelly bite or stamp the babies to death, from whom we cannot see any affection that nature has conferred to mothers.
sentences.translation: 更有甚者还会将小虎咬死、踩死、压死，看不出一点大自然赋予母性的慈爱。

sentences.sentence: Parturient tigresses will choose inaccessible places such as deep forests, caves and rock crevices as their lair. Anyone who gets access to their lair would no doubly be injured seriously.
sentences.translation: 雌虎在临产时会选择人迹罕至的深山老林、岩洞、石隙中做窝，此时如有人进入产仔区则必受伤害。
